section_text: 1 1 In section 1(6) of the Coinage Act 1971 (measurement of variation from standard weight)— a omit  “(other than a gold coin of a denomination mentioned in Schedule 1 to this Act)”, and b for  “shall be measured as the average of a sample of not more than one kilogram of that coin” substitute  “                    shall be measured in accordance with provision made by proclamation under section 3                  ” . 2 In section 3(1)(cd) of that Act (power to regulate coinage by proclamation) for  “specified in Schedule 1 to this Act for a gold coin of a denomination mentioned in that Schedule” substitute  “                for coins              ” .

2 1 This Act extends to England and Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland. 2 This Act comes into force at the end of the period of 2 months beginning with the day on which it is passed. 3 This Act may be cited as the Coinage (Measurement) Act 2011.
